snippet.title: Danger Scavenger - Early Access Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Danger Scavenger is an intense cyberpunk-themed rogue-lite skyline crawler that takes you to the roofs of the breathtaking cyberpunk city, where you will face mighty enemies controlled by soulless AI. Choose arcade or hardcore mode and play with a friend in co-op mode or fight the enemy AI alone.

GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/danger_scavenger
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1169740/Danger_Scavenger/
